name: Kevin Griffith
bio: Kevin Griffith is the author of Denmark, Kangaroo, Orange (2007) and Paradise Refunded (Backwaters Press, 1998). Poems from his collections have been read by Garrison Keillor on The Writer's Almanac and included in An American Life in Poetry, the weekly column on poetry written by Ted Kooser, former U.S. Poet Laureate. He lives in Ohio.
